format:
<style>
    /* =========================================
       0. IMPORTAR FUENTE MODERNA (Google Fonts)
       ========================================= */
    @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Montserrat:wght@300;500;700&family=Roboto+Mono:wght@400;700&display=swap');

    /* =========================================
       1. VARIABLES DEL TEMA (CONFIGURACIÓN)
       ========================================= */
    :root {
        --bg-profundo: #090b10;
        /* Fondo casi negro azulado */
        --glass-card: rgba(22, 27, 34, 0.7);
        /* Cristal oscuro */
        --glass-border: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
        --neon-verde: #00ff9d;
        /* Verde Cyberpunk */
        --neon-glow: rgba(0, 255, 157, 0.25);
        --texto-principal: #e6edf3;
        --texto-secundario: #8b949e;
        --fuente-ui: 'Montserrat', sans-serif;
        --fuente-data: 'Roboto Mono', monospace;
    }

    /* =========================================
       2. BASE Y FONDO
       ========================================= */
    body,
    .nr-dashboard-theme,
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: var(--bg-profundo) !important;
        background-image: radial-gradient(circle at 50% 0%, #161b22 0%, #090b10 70%) !important;
        font-family: var(--fuente-ui) !important;
        color: var(--texto-principal) !important;
    }

    /* =========================================
       3. TARJETAS (EFECTO CRISTAL)
       ========================================= */
    md-card {
        background-color: var(--glass-card) !important;
        backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        /* Efecto borroso detrás */
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
        border: 1px solid var(--glass-border) !important;
        border-radius: 16px !important;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important;
        transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.8, 0.25, 1);
        overflow: hidden;
        /* Para que nada se salga de los bordes redondos */
    }

    /* Efecto Hover: La tarjeta "respira" */
    md-card:hover {
        transform: translateY(-3px);
        border-color: rgba(0, 255, 157, 0.3) !important;
        box-shadow: 0 12px 40px rgba(0, 255, 157, 0.05) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        font-family: var(--fuente-ui);
        color: var(--neon-verde) !important;
        font-size: 11px !important;
        letter-spacing: 2px;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        font-weight: 700;
        opacity: 0.9;
        margin-bottom: 15px;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--glass-border);
        padding-bottom: 8px;
    }

    /* =========================================
       4. WIDGETS DE ALTO IMPACTO
       ========================================= */

    /* Header (Barra Superior) */
    md-toolbar {
        background: rgba(22, 27, 34, 0.95) !important;
        border-bottom: 1px solid var(--neon-verde) !important;
        box-shadow: 0 0 20px var(--neon-glow) !important;
    }

    /* Textos de Valores (Números grandes) */
    text.value-text,
    .value-text {
        font-family: var(--fuente-data) !important;
        fill: var(--texto-principal) !important;
        color: var(--texto-principal) !important;
        font-weight: 400 !important;
    }

    /* Gráficos (Chart) - Línea Brillante */
    .nr-dashboard-chart path {
        stroke: var(--neon-verde) !important;
        stroke-width: 2px !important;
        filter: drop-shadow(0 0 6px var(--neon-glow));
    }

    .nr-dashboard-chart .grid line {
        stroke: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-chart .grid text {
        fill: var(--texto-secundario) !important;
        font-size: 10px;
    }

    /* Botones */
    .md-button.md-raised {
        background: linear-gradient(135deg, #00b09b, #96c93d) !important;
        /* Gradiente moderno */
        border-radius: 50px !important;
        color: #fff !important;
        font-weight: bold;
        box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important;
    }

    /* =========================================
       5. LA TABLA (ESTILO FUTURISTA)
       ========================================= */
    .ui-table-list {
        background: transparent !important;
        border: none !important;
    }

    /* Cabecera Flotante */
    .ui-table-list table thead tr th {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6) !important;
        color: var(--neon-verde) !important;
        border-bottom: 2px solid var(--neon-verde) !important;
        font-family: var(--fuente-ui);
        font-weight: 700 !important;
        font-size: 12px !important;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 1px;
        padding: 15px 10px !important;
    }

    /* Cuerpo de la tabla */
    .ui-table-list table tbody tr {
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.01) !important;
        transition: background 0.2s ease;
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.03);
    }

    /* Efecto Hover en Fila */
    .ui-table-list table tbody tr:hover {
        background: rgba(0, 255, 157, 0.1) !important;
    }

    /* Celdas */
    .ui-table-list table tbody tr td {
        font-family: var(--fuente-data);
        /* Fuente tipo código para datos */
        font-size: 13px !important;
        color: var(--texto-principal) !important;
        border-top: none !important;
        /* Limpiamos líneas horizontales viejas */
        padding: 12px 10px !important;
    }

    /* Scrollbar Minimalista */
    ::-webkit-scrollbar {
        width: 6px;
        background: #090b10;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
        background: #30363d;
        border-radius: 3px;
    }

    ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
        background: var(--neon-verde);
    }

    /* Paginación */
    md-table-pagination {
        color: var(--texto-secundario) !important;
        border: none !important;
    }

    .md-select-value span {
        color: var(--neon-verde) !important;
    }
</style>
